data.text: @michealEje1 @landback_ @ClaysonMonyela We aint crying nor running away from our country but we holding the government accountable and that's something you guys lack.
@k22malemane @landback_ @ClaysonMonyela Then keep crying till u r ready to do d right thing.. I give zero fucks abt SA … that country don’t exist to me…

@michealEje1 @landback_ @ClaysonMonyela Let go back how they came. We not going to spending our tax monies for failed states and their citizens.  All you know is to leech on other countries and when they revolt against your kind you cry zenophobic attacks. Just shows who the scumbags are between you guys and ours.

@k22malemane @landback_ @ClaysonMonyela U have d power to send them out.. tell your fucking govt officials to their jobs! .. as long as u blood thirsty xenophobic fucks don’t kill anyone. Send em back to us in one piece and let’s sever ties. It would b d happiest day for me!
@michealEje1 @landback_ @ClaysonMonyela If not go get your people in Ukraine and also come get your people trashy people in SA.

@landback_ @ClaysonMonyela Ooh shut up! U fucking liar … your tax payers what? U must b sick in d head or something.. does it look like Nigeria would ever depend on u?. We r getting our citizens out, thankfully without your stupid country’s help! https://t.co/BlL8NUzdIB
